name: Beetle, Clacker Swarm
condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit 0' 1 tgt in the swarm's space. 14 (4d6) piercing damage or 7 (2d6) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hp or fewer.

special_abilities.name: Constant Clacking
special_abilities.desc: A creature that starts its turn in the swarm's space takes 5 (1d10) thunder.

special_abilities.name: Swarm
special_abilities.desc: Can occupy another creature's space and vice versa and swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny creature. Swarm can't regain hp or gain temp hp.
